items.title: Kelce's last dance? Why Chiefs star could retire from NFL
items.summary: With Kansas City's dynasty over and a wedding to Taylor Swift to plan for, the Chiefs' final two games of the season could be Travis Kelce's last in the NFL.

items.title: This is my toughest time as England captain - Stokes
items.summary: Ben Stokes said he is going through his "toughest time" as England captain, as the tourists' awful Ashes series is dogged by reports of excessive drinking.

items.title: Paramount Plus Coupon Codes and Deals: 50% Off
items.summary: Save on streaming with the latest Paramount+ promo codes and deals, including 50% off subscriptions, free trials, and more.

items.title: 'Why I was always driving home for Christmas'
items.summary: In his BBC Sport column, ex-Premier League boss Tony Pulis reflects on what the festive period was like as a player and manager.

items.title: Vitamix Promo Codes and Deals: $25 Off + Free Shipping
items.summary: Score discounts on blenders, food processors, immersion blenders, and more with our selection of Vitamix coupons and deals.

items.title: Archer ruled out of Ashes as Bethell replaces Pope
items.summary: England pace bowler Jofra Archer is ruled out of the remainder of the Ashes series with a side strain, while England drop former vice-captain Ollie Pope for the fourth Test in Melbourne.

items.title: Saturn's largest moon may be riddled with 'slushy tunnels' that contain alien life, new study hints
items.summary: Decades ago, a spacecraft suggested Saturn's largest moon, Titan, had an ocean. New observations suggest that the liquid may look more like slush.

items.title: James Webb telescope finds supermassive black hole hidden inside 'Jekyll and Hyde' galaxy
items.summary: The discovery of a hidden supermassive black hole inside an ancient galaxy suggests that some of our universe's most extreme objects could be invisible unless observed in infrared wavelengths, James Webb telescope observations reveal.

items.title: Snakes' mind-bending 'heat vision' inspires scientists to build a 4K imaging system that could one day fit into your smartphone
items.summary: The human eye can only detect wavelengths in the visible light range, but a new imaging system will let us "see" infrared radiation using smartphones.

items.title: Pompeii victims were wearing woolen cloaks in August when they died â€” but experts are split on what that means
items.summary: Some of the victims at Pompeii were wearing woolen cloaks when they died, even though it was August, new research finds.
